Which sentence shows a consistent point of view?
An aggressive news photographer knocked a reporter to the ground as the movie stars arrive for the Academy Awards. false
George Washington won his first battle when he defeats the Hessians in Trenton, New Jersey. false
John Steinbeck wrote his masterpiece <font face='lc-Italic'>The Grapes of Wrath</font> in 1939, but he does not win the Nobel Prize until 1962. false
Aunt Cheryl tried to kiss her little nephew, but he ran out of the room. true
Galileo did not invent the telescope, but he improves upon it in order to better observe the heavens. false
